adjustPosition() - Method in class GamePlay.Camera
 
ArtificialIntelligence - Class in GameObject.ArtificialIntelligence
Used as a template for the 3 different levels of artificial intelligence present in the game, which are composed by 2 fundamental methods: chasePlayer which tracks and follows the player, and move which specifies how the enemy behaves whether it is engaged in a chase or not.
ArtificialIntelligence() - Constructor for class GameObject.ArtificialIntelligence.ArtificialIntelligence

associatePlayerUserName(String) - Method in class Menu.MenuManager
Associates the program with the current logged in user.
aStar(Node, Node, boolean) - Method in class GameObject.ArtificialIntelligence.PathFinder
The A* algorithm calculates the shortest path between two specified nodes in the graph, it is similar to a Dijkstra's algorithm but with certain heuristics to optimize it in a number of ways.
authenticateUser(String, String) - Static method in class Database.DatabaseController
Authenticates a user by querying the database for a specified username and password.
